sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If it is given that \(a : b :: c : d \), then prove that
\[
	\frac{4a + 7b }{4c + 7d } = \frac{4a - 7b }{4c - 7d }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that
\[
	\frac{a }{b } = \frac{c }{d }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 a }{7 b } = \frac{4 c }{7 d }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 a + 7 b }{4 a - 7 b } = \frac{4 c + 7 d }{4 c - 7 d } \textrm{ {by componendo and dividendo}}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 a + 7 b }{4 c + 7 d } = \frac{4 a - 7 b }{4 c - 7 d }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{"Upon Multiplying numerator and denominator by $4$ and $7$ respectively on both sides we get \frac{4 a }{7 b } = \frac{4 c }{7 d }}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo rule, which states that if a:b :: c:d$, then $(a+b):(a-b)::(c+d):(c-d)$ to the previous equation, we get \frac{4 a + 7 b }{4 a - 7 b } = \frac{4 c + 7 d }{4 c - 7 d }"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{After multiplying the previous equation with $\frac{4 c + 7 d}{4 a - 7 b} we get, $\frac{4 a + 7 b }{4 c + 7 d } = \frac{4 a - 7 b }{4 c - 7 d}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
